name: Spoon Terror
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME HAS FLASHING LIGHTS, LOUD NOISES, BLOOD, A DEMONIC SIGN AND A SCARY SPOON 

STORY:

It's late at night and you made some cereal but you forgot to get a spoon too. 

Head into the kitchen and get a SPOON ... simple?

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move.

E to Interact.

LINKS:
